Text:
rigay1,- I have been looking for this for a long time. I have a copy I recorded on VHS when it first aired on SHOWTIME@trademark.all rights reserved, in 1991. This is a great show & thank you for the down load.

This is Tim Allen at his best !

I beleive they did'nt release it  nationaly is because of the the language (at the time).

If you love comedy ! this is it !
Seed? This is an awesome routine, been looking for it for a long time.
